version_description:
Update the app for an exclusive offer and more:

- Get 50% off our yearly plan with the newest version of the Skoove app! Offer ends August 1
- Continue with your current lesson when you re-open the app
- And, of course, the usual improvement

Update to the latest version of the app to enjoy:

- Improved pitch detection: Skoove is now even more precise in recognising what you are playing!
- Improvements and bug fixes

- The biggest songs addition ever on Skoove! More than 30 new songs for beginners! Learn and play all the tunes you need to bring your repertoire to the next level: timeless hits, movie soundtracks, modern and classical songs!Check it out now!
- Not su

- Skoove is now available in Spanish, French, Japanese, Korean, traditional and simplified Chinese!

- Bug fixes and improvements

- Skoove is now available in Spanish, French, Japanese, Korean, traditional and simplified Chinese!

- Bug fixes and improvements

Bring the fun of playing piano to your iPhone! Yes, with this update you can run Skoove on iPhone too, download it now!

Update the app on iPad - it comes with many bug fixes and improvements

Skoove is the easiest way to learn piano. We listened to your feedback and released an update that’s better than ever before.

It comes with many improvements and bug fixes for an even better experience.

How do you like Skoove? Give us a 5 s
